readable.title: 3501386648_e11e3f3152
readable.content: A forest guide points something up to a group of visitors . A group of about 11 people of all ages with binoculars in the woods A group of people are being lead on an outdoor tour with an older tour guide . A group of people pointing and looking at something off-camera . A group of people with cameras and binoculars point and look at something .
